    • Method Detail

      • toInteger

        public static int toInteger(oracle.sql.Datum datum,
            int defaultValue)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Converts an Oracle Datum into an int value, with a default value used if the datum is NULL.
        Parameters:
        datum - the Oracle Datum
        defaultValue - the value to use for NULLs
        Returns:
        an integer value
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if an error occurs

      • toIntArray

        public static int[] toIntArray(oracle.sql.ARRAY array,
               int defaultValue)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Converts an Oracle ARRAY into a int array, with a default value used to represent NULL values.
        Parameters:
        array - an Oracle ARRAY of integer values
        defaultValue - the value to use for NULL values
        Returns:
        an array of ints
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if an error was encountered

      • toNUMBER

        public static oracle.sql.NUMBER toNUMBER(double number)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Convenience method for NUMBER construction.

        Double.NaN is represented as NULL to agree with JTS use.

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
